website_summaries.verdict: The ComfyCush Era is the revised version of the Vans #95 sneaker. With the ComfyCush insole, this sneaker is made more cushioned and lightweight than the original model. Despite the internal changes, the external look of this shoe generally remains unchanged compared to its predecessor. With its new features, it is still one of the comfortable Vans sneakers that will give a whole lot of value for your money.
pros: A lot of users find the Vans ComfyCush Era to be very comfortable
Many commenters attest that this shoe is just as described
Several wearers notice that this sneaker is great for walking and running errands
The outsole of the ComfyCush Era is well-cushioned, according to plenty of reviews
Some say that wearing this shoe feels like walking on the clouds
Plenty of purchasers generally like the shoes from the Vans ComfyCush line
Numerous reviewers mention getting value for their money with this shoe
This sneaker feels lightweight, according to some
A good number of owners recommend getting a pair or two of the Vans ComfyCush Era
This shoe’s classic design is praised by many
cons: A few people complain about getting blisters in the heel after wearing the Vans ComfyCush Era for some time
The arch support from this shoe needs a bit more improvement, according to a couple of reviews

customer_reviews.title: my go to shoes since i was a kid - too pricey tho
customer_reviews.text: Vans are my brand and have been since i was a kid. This colour way had people asking about it. But like all vans ---- i wore them to death. The worse part tho is how they fade so rapid, the gum the canvas - everything. I got 2 pairs one for "fun" and one for... weddings and interviews {?} and even the less worn pair looked dog eared and "loved" after a few weeks. IDK i cant say much else other than i pretty much live in these shoes. They are what they are. But I wish they would drop the price point - its canvas and gum.... not Gold and Frankincense
customer_reviews.author: Mat Higham

customer_reviews.title: Used To Be Good. Now Made Cheaply
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these vans twice a week for two months a staple is now jabbing my foot from the inside of the shoe. Start caring about quality again, please!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M. Rose

customer_reviews.title: The real mccoy?
customer_reviews.text: Got the shoes and have been wearing them on and off for months. Trouble is, they don't fit. I've had other Vans ERA shoes the same size and currently have another pair of Vans in the same size and they all fit, but these are too small and pinch my feet terribly so I only wear them for short periods of time. Wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Bois

customer_reviews.title: Knock offs? Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Runs wayyyy too small and looks and feels like knock offs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, but painful
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine however the back of the shoe rubs on my foot and causes blistering. I cannot wear the shoes for long periods of time which has never happened with any of my other vans. I have been wearing vans for over 15 years now and I have owned a variety of styles and I have this same style in 3 other colors and I don't have the same issue with any of them. Not sure what happened with these...
customer_reviews.author: brittny flores

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of vans, these are comfy shoes as always and great casual shoes. Would not recommend if you need to do a lot of walking though due to lack of support, and when I tried to fit my insoles into them it made them a little uncomfortable to wear. I prefer just the regular canvas slip ons with the inserts if you want a really comfy casual shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love these - had a pair when I was 16 ...
customer_reviews.text: I listened to a lot of the previous reviews and got 1/2 size larger. I don’t regret that decision- 1/2 size larger fit perfectly. I have a little rubbing on one of my pinkie toes, but I attribute that to having Fred Flintstone feet. Other than that, I love these - had a pair when I was 16 and always wanted another and now they are mine. I rule!
customer_reviews.author: S Hill

customer_reviews.title: Received them in a generic brown box, are these real?
customer_reviews.text: Received my pair in a brown box and not in its Vans shoebox...hmmmmm??? A little sketchy if you ask me.. Not sure if they're real.
customer_reviews.author: Am0924

customer_reviews.title: are pretty basic and boring
customer_reviews.text: The shoes in themselves being all black, are pretty basic and boring, but to change the shoe laces give it a customized look! I really like them now! For the Holiday, I have red laces. They fit great, but I had to wear them in for a couple of weeks. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: C.N.M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. First 3 weeks I started wearing these, the fabric started tearing at the tip. Guess I'm gonna have to buy new shoes since their customer service was absolutely no help. Was expecting the quality to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Love the little details
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Storm Trooper Vans! The pattern is very subtle and you only notice the details when you look closely, which is great when you're an adult woman who dresses fairly traditionally but love Star Wars! They are very comfortable for every day wear and the black-and-white pattern goes well with jeans and any t-shirt. I may order another pair for when these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes ever !
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely true to size. I've been wearing this style of Vans for a long time, and they've always been my favorite (even out of the whole Vans line). When they came, I tried them on and they felt pretty snug (not tight), but after walking in them for a day or so the canvas started to stretch. Basically, order exactly your size and plan on needing to break them in. 10/10, will definitely buy another pair in two years when I kill these
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great daily driver of a shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes before, and they continue to be my favorite shoe for daily casual wearing. There is a bit of a break in period, where the back of the shoe kind of digs into my achilles, but that will go away (that's probably more due to me not wearing anything other than sandals or worn in running shoes for the last 4 months....
customer_reviews.author: JonE

customer_reviews.title: There is some arch support but it could be better. My main gripe
customer_reviews.text: Buy a full size larger than your size. I wear a 10.5 and these fit just right. Previously I'd ordered them in 11.0 and they were uncomfortably tight at the toe. There is some arch support but it could be better. My main gripe, about all sneakers made today, will they ever make laces that stay tied again? It gets tiresome double knotting.
customer_reviews.author: D. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Look good & true to size
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They look great and are true to size. Comfortable once they're broken in. They have more padding than most other Vans.
customer_reviews.author: Krantz

customer_reviews.title: Random purchase
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes Vans, and I noticed his were getting pretty worn when I visited him in a neighboring city. I came across these at a very reasonable price and purchased them online. He received the surprise package and really liked them. He has been wearing them since. My grandson likes style but not loud or showy articles of clothing. These shoes suited him just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Sweet classic goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Classics! I wear these with everything! If you have flat/wide/bunion feet you may have issues with the initial break-in and all-day wear. It is a necessity to wear your laces lose. Keep in mind that these shoes have very little to no arch support. I personally removed the OEM sole and use a thin more-supportive sole out of another pair of shoes. There is very little room for a thicker aftermarket sole like this one:  I highly recommend this insole for almost every shoe, except this one. To conclude, they look outstanding, but people with wide feet will need to make minor adjustments for full-day use. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: lilmtnwolf

customer_reviews.title: Vans never disappoint. But they were too small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter but it didn’t fit her. They were too small. I wear a 6.5 or 7 and they fit me so, I inherited her birthday gift. Aside from that, they are comfy. I wear the heck out of them. Still do. I made the mistake to garden with them recently so now I retired them as garden shoes. Nonetheless, I love these shoes. I’ve been buying Vans for 20 years. I like them better than converse.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good not super durable
customer_reviews.text: I got about 4 months of moderate use out of these shoes. They wore through at the soles to the point my feet would get soaked on wet streets. I didn't wear them every day and my hard use activities such as mountain biking i used different shoes. These are OK light duty skate / biking shoes or casual foot wear but they are not very durable. Price was OK. They aren't bad but i thought they'd last longer.
customer_reviews.author: John Gunz

customer_reviews.title: Old Skool and the best!
customer_reviews.text: Old Skool and the best! When I was younger I used to race BMX back in the 80's wearing these shoes and now that I am older and could be a grandma, I continue to wear these shoes. I just love them and they fit true to size and look good with everything. They are very comfortable and long lasting and the bottom of the shoes are perfect and no slip, even on bear trap bike pedals.
customer_reviews.author: F. Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 10. The size said it would fit a women's 10 but they don't. I couldn't even get my foot in them. I have a pair of Vans Atwood sneakers. They are a women's 10 and they fit perfect. I think these are cut a little more narrow than the Vans Atwood style. These are really nice just too small :(
customer_reviews.author: Peggie hornberger

customer_reviews.title: Really short
customer_reviews.text: I am used to wearing the Vans Atwood model which features a very traditional shoe height, but these are quite short! I appreciate that this may simply be the style but it's difficult to find a decent pair of pants that won't show your ankle and make you look like your pants are way too short! Good for shorts, never wear them with jeans. For such a large pricetag I would like them to be more versatile. They are quite durable and well-made, though.
customer_reviews.author: Vakama

customer_reviews.title: Not a wear all day kind of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Not advised shoe of choice if you're standing all day. Caution on the grip - when it gets wet from the rain, there is no grip.
customer_reviews.author: WX

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable plastic strip
customer_reviews.text: These are just what you would expect from a pair of Vans. There is, however, an uncomfortable plastic strip across the back that rubs and is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Busacker

customer_reviews.title: I love the way these shoes look
customer_reviews.text: Vans used to make very wide shoes. Now they make very narrow shoes. If you latched onto the Vans brand because you have wide feet, well, it's time to move on friend. Durability seems ok. On the plus side, I love the way these shoes look.
customer_reviews.author: The Third Bird

customer_reviews.title: Run Small... But GREAT Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these Vans Era sneakers for my daughter as a birthday gift. The first pair I bought in her regular size (women's 9 1/2) but they were way too small. Had to return (no charge thanks to Prime!) and had to go up one whole size (10 1/2). These fit perfect. She LOVES them tons, which makes me happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kahogg

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came within a day! Great for teenagers that can’t wait LOL. Perfect shoes, just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Vans always on point :-)
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Dad- loves them. Feels like he’s cool :-) I have a million pair, so knew they would be quality.
customer_reviews.author: amazon2020

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, if pricey
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. I think paying this much for a brand name is a bit rediculous, but they are as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Lael Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes work fine. Shoestrings were really long. Replaced with some shorter satin ones, which even dresses them up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. She says they have plenty of room. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Texas00

customer_reviews.title: Vans are a Great classic deck shoe.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I've grown up in VANS . Their great. Now my Mom wants my whitw ones. So I'm buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for work, just needed insoles
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe with a clean look and good grip. Have 2 pairs, and I used one pair for casual skating and days out. Bought the second pair for work since they provide a good amount of grip and are pretty durable, just needed a pair of insoles for long hours standing and adjusting the throat and tongue of the shoe to where I could slip them on and off without relacing them. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Khan

customer_reviews.title: Classic Van's are comfortable and made to last.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Van shoes because they're so comfortable and last well. We surprised her with these for her birthday. She was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Proactive Nana

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love Vann’s so when I saw these at a great price, I had to snag them! Awesome, cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: JennGee

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked nice, but I ordered 6.5s and received 11.5s. Will of course be returning. Looks like a glitch with the listing.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: While the shoes fit okay, they ARE NOT REAL ...
customer_reviews.text: While the shoes fit okay, they ARE NOT REAL VANS. Several obvious flaws including the rubber on the bottom of the shoe overlapping and creating a big bump on the back of the shoe. Bummer. Gotta pay full price! I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: heidi howe

customer_reviews.title: they are comfortable for her at high school
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a size larger because they were out of my daughter's size, but she LOVES them. Other than the normal breaking in pains, they are comfortable for her at high school. Vans have always been on the narrow side and are known to have little arch support.
customer_reviews.author: wallybowser

customer_reviews.title: Bomb Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Loved these retro cool skater shoes. Everyone thinks they are awesome and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband. He wears size 10 for all his shoes so I thought this would be a no-brainer. Unfortunately they are about a size too small. If I were to order again, I'd order a size 11. Otherwise they arrived quickly and the quality looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L

customer_reviews.title: Vans are great
customer_reviews.text: Great classic shoe. Can't go wrong with Vans, only reason for not giving it 5 stars is because they aren't the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The material was nice, canvas
customer_reviews.text: This is based on the shoes I received. They were an awkward fit. They were white but had yellow stains on them. The fit seemed narrow at the toe and instep area, larger in heel area, they seemed strange to walk in. The material was nice, canvas, seemed well constructed, possibly just did not fit my feet, but other Vans have done well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hydee J

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift of choice for my child and he absolutely loved it! The color and design are great and really fit as described. Got compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia B.

customer_reviews.title: They seem more comfortable then my old pairs from the 80s
customer_reviews.text: It’s vans. Wish they were still putting out these two tone colors. They seem more comfortable then my old pairs from the 80s, 90s that I still have.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8brd

customer_reviews.title: Vans are more comfortable than...
customer_reviews.text: The world loves converse but I am sticking with my vans! They have a wider toe bed and little more cushioning so I find them to be more comfortable for all day wear. I have these and several slip ons and I love them all!
customer_reviews.author: k. v.

customer_reviews.title: yes they are not great for support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes hurt my heel after a while. More specifically, the Achilles tendon. Yes they are flat, yes they are not great for support, but they are bitchin! Just wish they were more comfortable to wear for more than a few hours. Maybe after they break in some more.
customer_reviews.author: Roly FernandezTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This defect appeared only after 1 week! I am very sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: The shoes itself is great quality, but my advice to anyone considering purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 10 1/2 - 11 sized shoe. I looked up information on the way Vans fit and I read that they usually run a bit small. After reading that, I ordered a size 11. The shoe fits, but it's a little big. I still have about an inch in the toe. The shoes itself is great quality, but my advice to anyone considering purchasing is to be true to your shoe size. These seem to fit true.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he is very satisfied with the fit. We used to have a Van's Shoe Store close to home but they shut it down years ago. I raised my boys on Van tennis shoes so now I am back again since I know they last a long time (at least they used to way back then). My grandson said "nice shoes gramps" and he has received other complements as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: You shoes you lose...
customer_reviews.text: I know vans and these are probably cheap knockoffs. If you want a shoe that makes a rubber popping noise when walking then give these a shot. Customer support is no walk in the park either.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Teenager loved them
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. These shoes are about a year investment. After that they have fallen apart beginning on the inside. And that is for someone that wears them maybe twice a week. They look cute on. Teenager loved them
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mcwethy

customer_reviews.title: Classic Vans are trendy again!
customer_reviews.text: As expected, a good quality pair of shoes that I’ll have for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: bretski

customer_reviews.title: I will always love my Vans
customer_reviews.text: I will always love my Vans. I was really excited about these all black Vans. They fit well (I already knew my size, however), and have lasted. Thank you Vans, for making quality, comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.author: holdence

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical of buying Van's online. But when my package arrived and I tried on the shoes I was so surprised!! 😯 They git perfectly. And I really wanted some yellow shoes. So happy I made this purchase. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wear out way too fast. Only last my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Wear out way too fast. Only last my son 6-8 weeks. He is rough on his shoes with heavy use of scooters and skateboards. Only 2 stars because they use to last me 6 months to a year of hard skateboard use 20 years ago. Quality has went down hill.
customer_reviews.author: sleepe1

customer_reviews.title: Runs half size small...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. It runs small. First pair I ordered was women’s US 8. I gave them to my MIL and ordered a half size bigger which fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stylish Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fantastic. I can't speak to their longevity yet, but after wearing them for two weeks straight (which included a lot of walking), they don't seem to be any less durable than standard vans, even though the uppers are made from two layers of fabric rather than one, thicker layer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not Before Buying-
customer_reviews.text: Thumbnail shows a black line on the top of the sole. The pictures in the ad shows no black. The shoes did have the black line, which I did not want.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size label
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes in size 9, that is my usual size for Vans shoes and most brands. For some reason this pair was smaller (compared with the other pairs i have) even if the label says they are 9. I could say this pair is size 8 with the label of size 9. Totally dissapointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These are made well, however, I usually wear a size 8.5 and 9.5 was way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie May

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Has rubber like material unlike others We have purchased which rubs my sons heel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably comfortable and look exactly as depicted
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these shoes. The look exactly like the picture and fit well. The sole is a bit stiff and firm, but a pair of inserts gives them some cushion. I also used a fabric protector on the canvas and that seems to keep them looking sharp. I will probably purchase a similar pair from Vans because I am very pleased with this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and perfect. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Receiving the package was quick and snappy the inside box was busted but the shoes had no problems which is the most important I'm very glad I went with trough this company, I got my package only half a day after purchase. I value them because they know what people want and they thrive to be the best they can.
customer_reviews.author: Levi knott

customer_reviews.title: A true classic shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I knew before I purchased these shoes that I would love them as I have the same pair in other colors....I purchased these again because nothing lasts as long, wears as well, feels as comfortable and fits my style as well. I only purchased black because my other two pairs have patterns and I sometimes want to wear these shoes when the patterns did not match. Perfect for walking, my favorite exercise. Fit as expected if you follow the ordering guidelines and buy your normal size. Vans builds a sturdy shoe that will last and feel more and more comfortable as time goes on. They look cute with shorts, with jeans and even with casual dresses. A true classic.
customer_reviews.author: SavingdogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Still looking good after a year, the sole is not so good quality. Still nic.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy seller👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: A blast from the past...I had a pair when I was a teenager, and I was stoked to get my 47-year-old feet into some Van’s again! I’m not normally nostalgic, but thank you for quickly delivering a perfect, beautiful pair of shoes that I might cry the first time they get dirty.😉
customer_reviews.author: Tammara Becker

customer_reviews.title: I bought them before and I love mine
customer_reviews.text: For my granddaughter And I’m sure she’s going to love them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gentry

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe doesn't fit, it's too big
customer_reviews.text: The shoes don't fit. Way too large. I ordered the same size of my Converse All-Stars. But obviosly the sizing is incorrect. The sizes for Vans are for men. I tried on the shoes after I threw out the package box. So I've not returned them. Could I return them and get credit? I also didn't like the style. Appeared much different in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Luisita Torregrosa

customer_reviews.title: Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: These look very nice with khakis, jeans and even shorts. My son wears them to school and they look good and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Garden

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I've had about 6 pairs of this style of vans and I have always worn the same size. These came fitting a full size smaller than they should have. SUPER disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: love these so much!!
customer_reviews.text: i got the red white and blue one for 4th of july and i didn’t think they were going to make it in time for what i had planned but they came early and they are sosososo cute and they fit just right i thought they were going to be to small but they are just right
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: my daughter ordered the wrong size. thought it was ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter ordered the wrong size. thought it was a ladies size and ended up being a men's. in the process of returning. Ordered the correct size and came the next day. Gave her blisters on the first wear, but new shoes do that
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Reinhold

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for another person. They really like them, and have told me they fit great. They really look good on her!
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up
customer_reviews.text: Rubber bottoms are separating with minimal wear. Own multiple pairs of vans but these are just not holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest Birthday Gift Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are for my daughter and she has not said anything at all, but that SMILE on her face has been there since the very day the doorbell rang and there was the greatest BIRTHDAY gift of all!! From, Mom!! Thanks, Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Susan Glenn Sheby

customer_reviews.title: Price is right, shoes are authentic, and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfectly new, comfortable, and come in a color combination that is very universal. Look great with short socks, long socks, jeans, shorts, anything. The fabric breaths and scotch guard works great on them.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. Comfy and stylish. I have to buy them every six months if I wear them consistently at Starbucks (work) but they are my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: My nine year old has done better with other brand name shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes wore out just as fast as the cheap ones from Walmart. My nine year old has done better with other brand name shoes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Needham

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Vans!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves his new Vans. They fit perfectly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected/received on time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son. They were recieved on time, packaged well, and they fit perfectly. Sizing appears to be in line w/normal sizing. I would recommned these if you are into Vans. My sons says they feel comfortable and he really likes to look of the shoe. First time ordering from this seller. Good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoes
customer_reviews.text: The product was not as pictured. I ordered the shoes with the white around the bottom and white laces. I received all black. I had to have the shoes for work and so I had to wear them and I can’t return them. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cady

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy shoes online
customer_reviews.text: Earlier I had purchased Vans shoes for my daughter. They did not fit. Was somewhat small. And now this one for myself also a little bit small. I used the size table and worked with the length of my foot. I learned a lesson. Seems that there is a difference. For safety's sake I will not purchase shoes online anymore
customer_reviews.author: GPawiro

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Vans
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. Fit great. Look nice with shorts, jeans, or khaki's. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Steffie

customer_reviews.title: Black Leather
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful they fit perfect i love vans iconic style the black/brown leather make for a great casual look. going to buy a second pair
customer_reviews.author: sean yarusinsky

customer_reviews.title: Cool cause thier vans but painful.
customer_reviews.text: Love vans but if you have normal width feet in this model they hurt like crazy over a day. Squeeze your toes together.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfy shoes all day long!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in both navy & black for my son, and he's only taken them off to put the other color on. He's a busy guy, always rolling from one thing to the other & they keep right up with him. They're a hit, and we recommend them highly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are VERY comfortable now that I've broke them in
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY comfortable now that I've broke them in, but before that they were hard to wear for more than a few hours before giving my feet awful blisters. They're awesome once you've been wearing them a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these shoes for several months and still have to wear Band-Aids on the back of my heels or I will be in complete discomfort. I NEVER wear these if I know I will be doing a lot of walking. They are, however, very classic looking which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. King

customer_reviews.title: Regular Vans too narrow for my son's foot
customer_reviews.text: We bought two pairs of these Vans for my son and he has wide feet. We even went up a size on the second pair and they are so tight width wise that he cannot even get them on his foot. We had to return both pairs for a refund. We went to a Vans store and bought a ProSkater Vans shoe instead, which is made a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Constance L Presley

customer_reviews.title: Loved those Vans!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my sons Vans of course I thought they were black but they were brown but we’re still happy with them! It’s not your fault I can’t see well lol! Thank you for such fast shipping as well!
customer_reviews.author: Theressa Law

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Too small, brought same style & size last Christmas for my husband. Was just different material. These were not even close & was very disappointed. They were a surprise gift to go with a pair of new Dickies Work Jeans. Not enough time to return them & couldn't figure out how to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!!!! Buyer beware! Not sure these are actually Van's or Van's quality has gone down the tubes. Just bought them in April the shoes have started to pull apart in may and the Vans emblem on the heel is crooked!! Not worth the$$
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes a lot - they are comfortable and supportive. I use them for long boarding and weight lifting and I couldn't be happier with them. I've had them for about 6 weeks - they are holding up great to constant use and there are no signs of wear that are abnormal. The fit was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Memories..
customer_reviews.text: I need a pair of plain classic white shoes, and these worked out just fine. I had a pair back in the day, and I remembered how comfortable they were! The hardest part is keeping them clean, I ordered the True White color..
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon Girl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. True to size.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are true to size. I would buy again. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Vans is great and just got awesome with this Star Wars logo Vans shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the shoe. He still wears it even though it's already got so much wear and tear from him using it out ALL the time :)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Amuan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style
customer_reviews.text: White parts are not as clear on mines, picture shows brighter white than they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Not the true size
customer_reviews.text: Not the correct size even though it says the size is a 9 its way bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. He loves them! They are still in perfect condition after 2 months of everyday wear. Very good quality. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Dent

customer_reviews.title: so besides the lack of arch support they are great. They survived an extensive amount of walking while ...
customer_reviews.text: I have crazy flat feet, so besides the lack of arch support they are great. They survived an extensive amount of walking while I was in China, and they lasted almost constant walking while visiting the must sees in Beijing i.e. the Great Wall and Tiananmen.
customer_reviews.author: Aish

product_meta.title: Vans Unisex Era 59 Skateboarding Shoe
product_meta.description:
MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION
March 16, 1966, on 704E Broadway street in Anaheim, California, Paul Van Doren and three other partners opened their first ever store and the Vans dream was born. The Van Doren Rubber Company was unique in that it manufactured shoes for sale directly to the public. On that first morning, 12 customers purchased shoes which were made that day and ready for pick-up in the afternoon, the Vans #44 deck shoes, which are now known as the Authentic, were launched. These classic Vans combined canvas uppers with thick-bottomed vulcanised soles – a distinctive style that became the signature look of the company. From this starting point over 40 years ago, Vans has risen to become a worldwide dominant force in the footwear and action sports markets, making it the brand of choice for the contemporary consumer seeking action sport and lifestyle footwear.
